ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] dragon twisting
ygData.msgSnippet: Weave ONLY Elemental and Guardian.  Do not attack. Your job is to keep the party from being feared and to minimize lava breath damage.  If ya try and give
ygData.messageBody:
Weave ONLY Elemental and Guardian. Do not attack. Your job is to keep the
party from being feared and to minimize lava breath damage. If ya try and
give nagapus a knuckle sandwhich he is likely to return the favor, and he
hits for a lot more then you do :)

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Tork [mailto:tdomeii@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2000 6:44 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] dragon twisting


From: Tork <tdomeii@...>

Thanks for the info on the neckware... it just so
happens Nag is up tonight, so we'll see if the good
King will oblige me. I actually really like my blue
bard bird man helm, but I'll be grubbing for a crown
too. :)

That being said, if I weezle into the prime nag group,
has it been your experience to try and keep just
guardian and elemental rhythms up or should I go for 3
(I'm very good at twisting without queues so heavy lag
won't hamper keeping 3 up 90% of the time). If 3,
then what to add?

Thanks,
-Tork@Nameless
